title: Venereal disease: the hidden epidemic
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Tom Smith
brief_description: Presents a brief history of venereal disease, examines the symptoms of syphilis and gonorrhoea and the micro-organisms which cause these diseases, and emphasises the importance and methods of treatment. Shows frank discussions between doctors and patients in a treatment clinic
